com.novartis.opensource.yada.util

Class YADAUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.util.YADAUtils

  • public class YADAUtils
extends Object
    Provider of convenience methods and "one-liners" for use primarily in plugins, but also used in the guts of the framework.
    Author:
    David Varon

      One-liner execution of a sql statement, returning an SQL ResultSet.

      One-liner execution of a single YADA "get" (as opposed to "update" or "upload").

      Executes the queries defined in jp and returns the result.

      A wrapper function which calls the Q_NEXTVAL query, which executes an Oracle nextval function on seq.
      static String getVersion()
      Returns the in-use version of the YADA framework.
      static boolean hasBypassPlugin(YADARequest yadaReq)
      Returns true if a YADARequest.BYPASS plugin was registered in the request
      static boolean hasJSONParams(YADARequest yadaReq)
      Returns true if yadaReq contains a JSONParams variable that is non-null and has a size > 0.

      Uses java reflection to determine if yadaReq contains a plugin of type

      Returns true if a YADARequest.POSTPROCESS plugin was registered in the request

      Returns true if a YADARequest.PREPROCESS plugin was registered in the request
      static boolean hasQname(YADARequest yadaReq)
      Returns true if the qname parameter was set in the request, or if it was not set, but a BYPASS or PREPROCESS plugin was.
      static boolean useJSONParams(YADARequest yadaReq)
      Returns true if hasJSONParams(YADARequest) is true and hasQname(YADARequest) is false.

      • PARAM_FRAGS

        public static final String[] PARAM_FRAGS
        A contsant String[] array containing the param name fragment constants of all request-level parameters:

        PARAM_FRAG_COUNT, PARAM_FRAG_FILTERS, PARAM_FRAG_PAGESIZE, PARAM_FRAG_PAGESTART, PARAM_FRAG_SORTKEY, PARAM_FRAG_SORTORDER, PARAM_FRAG_METHOD, PARAM_FRAG_FORMAT, PARAM_FRAG_DELIMITER, PARAM_FRAG_ROW_DELIMITER, PARAM_FRAG_QNAME, PARAM_FRAG_HARMONYMAP, PARAM_FRAG_PROTOCOL, PARAM_FRAG_UPDATE_STATS, PARAM_FRAG_JOIN, PARAM_FRAG_LEFTJOIN

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public static String getVersion()
                         throws YADAResourceException
        Returns the in-use version of the YADA framework.
        Returns:
        this YADA framework version derived from JNDI yada_version variable
        Throws:
        YADAResourceException - when the JNDI path cannot be found or read
        Since:
        0.5.1.0

      • getNextVal

        public static int getNextVal(String seq)
                      throws YADAExecutionException
        A wrapper function which calls the Q_NEXTVAL query, which executes an Oracle nextval function on seq.
        Parameters:
        seq - the oracle sequence name from which to obtain the value
        Returns:
        int containing the result of nextval
        Throws:
        YADAExecutionException - when the function call fails

      • executePreparedStatement

        public static ResultSet executePreparedStatement(String sql,
                                 Object[] params)
                                          throws YADAConnectionException,
                                                 YADASQLException
        One-liner execution of a sql statement, returning an SQL ResultSet. Note: This method opens a db connection but DOES NOT CLOSE IT. Use the static method ConnectionFactory.releaseResources(ResultSet) to close it from the calling method
        Parameters:
        sql - the query to execute
        params - the data values to map to query columns
        Returns:
        a ResultSet object containing the result of the query
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when the datasource is inaccessible
        YADASQLException - when the JDBC configuration or execution fails

      • executePreparedStatement

        public static ResultSet executePreparedStatement(String sql)
                                          throws YADAConnectionException,
                                                 YADASQLException
        One-liner execution of a jdbc-parameter-less sql statement, returning an SQL ResultSet. Note: This method opens a db connection but DOES NOT CLOSE IT. Use the static method ConnectionFactory.releaseResources(ResultSet) to close it from the calling method
        Parameters:
        sql - the query to execute
        Returns:
        a ResultSet object containing the result of the query
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when the datasource is inaccessible
        YADASQLException - when the JDBC configuration or execution fails

      • executeCallableStatement

        public static int executeCallableStatement(String sql)
                                    throws YADAConnectionException,
                                           YADASQLException
        One-liner execution of an SQL function.
        Parameters:
        sql - the query to execute
        Returns:
        the result of the function
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when the datasource is inaccessible
        YADASQLException - when the JDBC configuration or execution fails

      • executeYADAGet

        public static String executeYADAGet(String[] qname,
                    String[] params)
        One-liner execution of a single YADA "get" (as opposed to "update" or "upload"). Sets count = false
        Parameters:
        qname - the name of the query to execute
        params - the params to map to the query columns
        Returns:
        the result of the query

      • executeYADAQuery

        public static Object executeYADAQuery(YADARequest yadaReq)
                               throws YADAExecutionException
        A convenience/utility method to execute a single "standard" yada query (i.e., one with qname and params. JSONParams-based requests with multiple queries are not supported by this method.
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        Object result of query execution
        Throws:
        YADAExecutionException - if multiple query executions are attempted, or other YADA exceptions are thrown internally

      • executeYADAGetWithJSONParams

        public static String executeYADAGetWithJSONParams(JSONParams jp)
        Executes the queries defined in jp and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        jp - the configuration object
        Returns:
        String result of statement execution

      • executeYADAUpdateWithJSONParams

        public static String executeYADAUpdateWithJSONParams(JSONParams jp)
        One-liner execution of a YADA "update" query. Sets response to CountResponse, returning only the int result, as a String, of caurse.
        Parameters:
        jp - the configuration object
        Returns:
        the result of the query

      • hasJSONParams

        public static boolean hasJSONParams(YADARequest yadaReq)
        Returns true if yadaReq contains a JSONParams variable that is non-null and has a size > 0. This method does not validate the value, and could return true even if the json string is malformed or non-compliant.
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        boolean status of the parameter

      • hasPlugin

        private static boolean hasPlugin(String type,
                YADARequest yadaReq)
        Uses java reflection to determine if yadaReq contains a plugin of type
        Parameters:
        type - the plugin scope
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        true if the current config references a loadable plugin class

      • hasBypassPlugin

        public static boolean hasBypassPlugin(YADARequest yadaReq)
        Returns true if a YADARequest.BYPASS plugin was registered in the request
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        true if a YADARequest.BYPASS plugin was registered in the request

      • hasPreprocessPlugin

        public static boolean hasPreprocessPlugin(YADARequest yadaReq)
        Returns true if a YADARequest.PREPROCESS plugin was registered in the request
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        true if a YADARequest.PREPROCESS plugin was registered in the request

      • hasPostprocessPlugin

        public static boolean hasPostprocessPlugin(YADARequest yadaReq)
        Returns true if a YADARequest.POSTPROCESS plugin was registered in the request
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        true if a YADARequest.POSTPROCESS plugin was registered in the request

      • hasQname

        public static boolean hasQname(YADARequest yadaReq)
        Returns true if the qname parameter was set in the request, or if it was not set, but a BYPASS or PREPROCESS plugin was.
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        true if the qname parameter was set in the request, or if it was not set, but a BYPASS or PREPROCESS plugin was.

      • useJSONParams

        public static boolean useJSONParams(YADARequest yadaReq)
        Returns true if hasJSONParams(YADARequest) is true and hasQname(YADARequest) is false.
        Parameters:
        yadaReq - YADA request configuration
        Returns:
        true if hasJSONParams(YADARequest) is true and hasQname(YADARequest) is false.
